rules.prepare:
export OPTIMIZER=-O export DEBUG=-DNDEBUG export CC='gcc -g'
cd $XPACK_SOURCE_DIR autoconf ./configure --prefix=/usr --libexecdir=/lib --libdir=/lib
rules.install: cd $XPACK_BUILD_DIR make DIST_ROOT=$XPACK_INSTALL_DIR LIBTOOL=/usr/bin/libtool -C . install make DIST_ROOT=$XPACK_INSTALL_DIR LIBTOOL=/usr/bin/libtool -C . install-dev make DIST_ROOT=$XPACK_INSTALL_DIR LIBTOOL=/usr/bin/libtool -C . install-lib make DIST_ROOT=$XPACK_INSTALL_DIR LIBTOOL=/usr/bin/libtool -C build src-manifest
